articles.author: Kurt Ganapathy
articles.title: Some F&B chains go back to 2-person dine-in limit, regardless of COVID-19 vaccination status - channelnewsasia.com
articles.description: SINGAPORE: With tightened restrictions for dining-in kicking in on Monday (Jul 19), at least 10 fast-food, restaurant and cafe chains have said they are limiting dining-in group sizes to two people, regardless of their vaccination status.
